verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> In the second לְדָרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> in the sixth בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> came the word יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by חַגַּ֣י <S%H2292><s%> Haggai הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <S%H2216><s%> unto Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <S%H6346><s%> governor יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> and to Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹצָדָ֛ק <S%H3087><s%> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> This people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not עֶת־ <S%H6256><s%> The time בֹּ֛א <S%H935><s%> is not come עֶת־ <S%H6256><s%> the time בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD'S לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> should be built פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by חַגַּ֥י <S%H2292><s%> Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הַעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> [Is it] time לָכֶם֙ אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> for you O ye to dwell בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֣ם <S%H1004><s%> houses סְפוּנִ֑ים <S%H5603><s%> in your cieled וְהַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> and this house הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this חָרֵֽב׃ <S%H2720><s%> desolate

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> your ways

זְרַעְתֶּ֨ם <S%H2232><s%> Ye have sown הַרְבֵּ֜ה <S%H7235><s%> much וְהָבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> and bring מְעָ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> in little אָכ֤וֹל <S%H398><s%> ye eat וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no לְשָׂבְעָה֙ <S%H7654><s%> but ye have not enough שָׁת֣וֹ <S%H8354><s%> ye drink וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> one לְשָׁכְרָ֔ה <S%H7937><s%> but ye are not filled with drink לָב֖וֹשׁ <S%H3847><s%> ye clothe וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> one לְחֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> you but there is none warm ל֑וֹ וְהַ֨מִּשְׂתַּכֵּ֔ר <S%H7936><s%> and he that earneth wages מִשְׂתַּכֵּ֖ר <S%H7936><s%> earneth wages אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into צְר֥וֹר <S%H6872><s%> [to put it] into a bag נָקֽוּב׃ <S%H5344><s%> with holes פ

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> your ways

עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> Go up הָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> and bring עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood וּבְנ֣וּ <S%H1129><s%> and build הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house וְאֶרְצֶה־ <S%H7521><s%> and I will take pleasure בּ֥וֹ [וְאֶכָּבֵד כ] (וְאֶכָּבְדָ֖ה <S%H3513><s%> abounding with ק) אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

פָּנֹ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> Ye looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַרְבֵּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> for much וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לִמְעָ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> and lo [it came] to little וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> and when ye brought הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> [it] home וְנָפַ֣חְתִּי <S%H5301><s%> I did blow ב֑וֹ יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because מֶ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> Why נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> upon it Why? saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because בֵּיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> of mine house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חָרֵ֔ב <S%H2720><s%> that [is] waste וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> of you רָצִ֖ים <S%H7323><s%> and ye run אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> unto his own house

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> because כָּלְא֥וּ <S%H3607><s%> over you is stayed שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> Therefore the heaven מִטָּ֑ל <S%H2919><s%> from dew וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth כָּלְאָ֥ה <S%H3607><s%> is stayed יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <S%H2981><s%> [from] her fruit

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> And I called חֹ֜רֶב <S%H2721><s%> for a drought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> and upon the mountains וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> and upon the corn וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and upon the new wine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> and upon the oil וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תּוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> and upon [that] which the ground וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> and upon men וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and upon cattle וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְגִ֥יעַ <S%H3018><s%> and upon all the labour כַּפָּֽיִם׃ <S%H3709><s%> of the hands ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> obeyed זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <S%H2216><s%> Then Zerubbabel בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֡ל <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹצָדָק֩ <S%H3087><s%> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> with all the remnant הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the words חַגַּ֣י <S%H2292><s%> of Haggai הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after שְׁלָח֖וֹ <S%H7971><s%> had sent יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> did fear הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> him and the people מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then spake חַגַּ֞י <S%H2292><s%> Haggai מַלְאַ֧ךְ <S%H4397><s%> messenger יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S בְּמַלְאֲכ֥וּת <S%H4400><s%> message יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD'S לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> I [am] with you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיָּ֣עַר <S%H5782><s%> stirred up יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּחַ֩ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit זְרֻבָּבֶ֨ל <S%H2216><s%> of Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֜ל <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <S%H6346><s%> governor יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹצָדָק֙ <S%H3087><s%> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> of all the remnant הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they came וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and did מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> work בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God פ

בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <S%H702><s%> In the four לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בַּשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <S%H8345><s%> of the sixth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> in the second לְדָרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king
